scripts.prettier: forge fmt && forge fmt ./test/** && forge fmt ./scripts/**
scripts.test:migration: forge test -vvv --fork-url $(grep MAINNET_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --evm-version cancun --match-test testMultiMigration --fork-block-number 22845156
scripts.scc:report: scc src --sort names --no-cocomo --exclude-dir interfaces --by-file --format wide > scc-report.txt
scripts.coverage:report: forge coverage --force --fork-url $(grep HOLESKY_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --gas-limit 1000000000000000 --fork-block-number 3682000 --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info -o report --branch-coverage --rc derive_function_end_line=0 && rm lcov.info
scripts.deploy:dvv: forge script --use 0.8.25 scripts/mainnet/DVV.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep MAINNET_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --slow --evm-version cancun -vvvv --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ETHERSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.deploy:collector: forge script --use 0.8.25 scripts/collector/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep MAINNET_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --slow --evm-version cancun -vvvv --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ETHERSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.deploy:factory: forge script --use 0.8.25 scripts/deploy/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep MAINNET_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --slow --evm-version cancun -vvvv --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ETHERSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
